item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Happiness after enjoying the adventures of the Blue Hills skyline trail with an after hike on the red loop Our group chose to keep our Sunday mornings moving. This week we will be at the Fells.

Even better Diana will be inviting her group: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack walk to join us! More good news ... looks like Mo and Sarah are going to be hiking with us again too! Yay ... we did have fun today at the Blue Hills and now we hope you will join us at the Fells this Sunday.

Please Come out and enjoy a 2 -3 hour hike up, down, and around the skyline and rock circuit trails at the fells this Sunday August 9th at 10:00am.

Want to Join us? .... Grab your pack, a power bar or two, water for you and your pup, some bags, put on your shoes, spray your bug spray, and meet us at the flynn rink parking lot

Looking for directions? ... Here are the ones I got off the web: Flynn Memorial Rink is located on the Stoneham line, near New England Memorial Hospital off the Fellsway. From I-93: I-93 North to exit 33 (Rt. 28 North Fellsway W). Follow Fellsway West to Elm St. Turn right on Elm St. Follow Elm St. to Woodland Road. Turn left on Woodland Rd.

Trying to find us? ... I am the brunette next to the small white puff of a bichon, Breezy, driving the vintage, old, white audi.

Want more fun ... after we hike ... Lets find a dog friendly patio for a bite and a drink ... any ideas on where this might be?

We look forward to your RSVP and hope you are able to say yes!

Chat soon

Kristan
item.how_to_find_us: Luis is the dark hair man with the gorgeous brown american pit bull either Zeus or Coco driving the green truck and I am the brunette next to the small white puff of a bichon, Breezy, driving the vintage, old, white audi.
item.name: lets explore the Fells
